name: Voltaic
description:
Playable with controller only.

- Left Joystick to move.

- Right Bumper to release your electricity weapon.
- Right Bumper (again) to bring it back in.

A 40 hour Make-A-Thing jam game from 15/5/2017 - 19/5/2017. There are 3 words given at the start of the jam and teams use these words as inspiration for their projects. Whether they choose to stick to these words or not are up to them.

This Make-A-Thing jam words were:

- Cascade

- Sundown

- Split

Enemies Cascade from the sky constantly and in frequent succession.
The "Sun" is constantly revolving around the universe and only lights part of the planet you traverse forever sundown.
Split the enemies with the lightning weapon you have at your disposal. Split those enemies again.
